snippet.title: Sortik Systems | Trailer
snippet.description:
Sortik Systems is an immersive mixed-reality experience that will test your ability to classify objects with precision and speed. There is no room for chaos here.
Your task seems simple: place each object in its proper place and contribute to the perfection of order. But what if this perfect system hides dark intentions? Discover the truth behind Sortik Systems.

Available on Meta Quest: https://vr.meta.me/s/25obmjRUCpzB5Kq

Visit our website: https://games.pamp.es/

Follow Pamp Games
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sortiksystems/
